language.name: (name of language)
language.author: (author's name)
language.version: (version of StrokesPlus this was made for)

Messages.AlreadyRunning:
StrokesPlus is already running.
Click Yes if you really intend to run another instance of StrokesPlus.
Messages.OtherGestureAppRunning:
At least one of the following programs are running:
StrokeIt High Sign Sensiva Mouse Wrangler gMote MaZZicK Just Gestures
Be sure only one of us is active or you will not have a good time.
To disable this message, set CheckForOtherGesturePrograms to 0 in StrokesPlus.xml.
Messages.RequiresAdmin:
StrokesPlus must be run with administrative privileges. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Seriously, though, if you don't have admin access, you probably shouldn't be using this program. :-)
Messages.ForegroundLockTimeout:
Foreground Lock Timeout > 0
Translation: I may not successfully bring windows to the foreground.
Would you like me to update this setting?
Messages.ForegroundLockTimeoutFail:
I failed to update the setting.
Perhaps try reinstalling if you experience issues.
Messages.SaveConfigFail: Failed to write StrokesPlus.xml. If this perists, your config file may be corrupt or you may not have permissions to update the file; deleting StrokesPlus.xml will create a new config file, but will have no gestures or actions defined.
Messages.LoadConfigFail:
Failed to load/parse StrokesPlus.xml. If this perists, your config file may be corrupt; deleting StrokesPlus.xml will create a new config file, but will have no gestures or actions defined.
Exiting StrokesPlus.
Messages.LoadActionsFail:
Failed to load/parse ActionHelp.xml. Try replacing the file with a copy from the portable StrokesPlus ZIP download.
This isn't a fatal error, but there will be no actions in the Available Actions drop down.
Messages.AdminModeMessage:
Beginning with version 2.2.1, StrokesPlus no longer requires Administrator privileges to run.

For most uses, this is acceptable. However, there are some unexpected behaviors that you may run into.

For example, S+ will not be able to control other programs running with elevated privileges, and there may be a couple actions which will not work due the underlying calls to Windows requiring Administrator privileges.

If you prefer to run S+ with elevated privileges, you may right-click the StrokesPlus.exe file and select Properties -> Compatibility -> Run this program as an administrator.

However, S+ cannot be started automatically with Windows if it opens with Administrator privileges.
If you run the signed version of S+ from a protected folder (Program Files) in Windows 8, these issues can be avoided.
Messages.Win8LauncherMessage:
Due to changes in Windows 8, S+ may not interact with certain Windows 8 screens unless you have UAC disabled or use the signed version of S+.
See this post for more details:
http://www.strokesplus.com/windows8
Messages.TouchPadNotSupportedMessage:
TouchPad not supported.
Either it's not being reported as a TouchPad, is not multi-finger capable, or an error was encountered while initializing the device.
Synaptics TouchPad support will be disabled; you may enable support again in the Preferences tab.
Messages.ReloadSettingsOpenTitle: I'm sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that.
Messages.ReloadSettingsOpenMessage: Please close all StrokesPlus windows before calling acReload().

Gestures.Title: Gestures
Gestures.SavedImmediately: Note: Gesture changes are saved immediately.

AdvancedOptionsFrame.Title: Advanced / Experimental* Options
AdvancedOptionsFrame.GestureWindowOnTop: Keep Gesture Draw Window On Top*
AdvancedOptionsFrame.RecognizeOnMouseWheel: Fire Recognition on Mouse Wheel Scroll*
AdvancedOptionsFrame.CaptureModifiersOnMouseDown: Capture Modifiers on Stroke Button Down*
AdvancedOptionsFrame.OnlyDefinedApps: Only Capture On Defined Applications (no Global Actions)
AdvancedOptionsFrame.AllowHorzMouseWheelTick: Allow Horizontal Mouse Wheel Tick Script*

Application.DoNotProcess: Do not process Global Actions for this app, only app actions
Application.Qualifiers:
All qualifiers in this list will determine if the app is a match when the stroke button is pressed. The pattern fields are for regular expression matches.
Only one field is required; often times, clearing all but the File Name is sufficient.

FormText.NoGestureRequired:
Check Capture Modifiers on Stroke Button Down in Preferences to enable the Modifier Check options.
You don't have to select a gesture, modifier(s) alone can define an action.

Messages.CloseNameWindow: Please close the name window first.
Messages.NewGesture: Click OK, then draw the new gesture. Nothing will be lost in this window, it's just hidden.
Messages.ActionConflict: The following action already has the same gesture/modifiers defined:

Report.Title: Action Report
Report.TopText: This is a list of all defined actions. Click the column headings to sort the report as desired.

Ignored.Title: Ignored List
Ignored.DisableOnActivate: Disable S+ if this application is activated
Ignored.Qualifiers: Anything which matches all of the qualifiers in this list will be ignored when the stroke button is pressed. The pattern fields are for regular expression matches. Only one field is required.

Messages.CloseNameWindow: Please close the name window first.

Messages.IgnoredExists: An ignored entry with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
Messages.AppExists: An application with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
Messages.ActionExists: An action with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
Messages.GestureExists: A gesture with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
Messages.HotkeyExists: A hotkey with the same name already exists. \nPlease enter a different name.

SaveGesture.Title: Save Gesture
SaveGesture.NameGesture: What would you like to name this gesture?
SaveGesture.Info: Entering the same name as an existing gesture will add this pattern to the existing gesture. Having multiple samples will improve recognition.

LuaTab.Title: Global Lua
LuaTab.Text: The Lua code below is your StrokesPlus.lua file. You can utilize this file to store your own functions or variables which are accessible to all action scripts. Changes made are saved and loaded into the Lua engine immediately when you click Apply or OK.

Password.Title: Enter Password
Password.SetText: Enter the password which will be used to encrypt your config file and restrict access to the configuration window.
Password.EnterText: You must enter your password to start StrokesPlus or access the configuration window.
Password.ChangeText: Enter the current password and a new one. If the New Password field is left blank, password protection will be removed.

HotkeysFrame.Title: Hotkey

None <0>0</0> <1>1</1> <2>2</2> <3>3</3> <4>4</4> <5>5</5> <6>6</6> <7>7</7> <8>8</8> <9>9</9> NUMPAD 0 NUMPAD 1 NUMPAD 2 NUMPAD 3 NUMPAD 4 NUMPAD 5 NUMPAD 6 NUMPAD 7 NUMPAD 8 NUMPAD 9 Multiply Add Subtract Decimal Divide A B C D E F G H I J K

FormText.InfoText:
Hotkeys are global actions that will fire whenever you press the corresponding key combination.
Note that mouse-related variables are not passed into hotkey Lua scripts; such as gsx, gwd, etc.

Messages.HotkeyConflict: The following hotkey already has the same key/modifiers defined:
